item.title: TUCTF 2019
item.author: cryptax
item.description: I tried TU CTF. I only played 1 or 2 hours and flagged quite a lot: this is an easy CTF, good for beginners. See some very quick write-ups below. Unfortunately I can’t remember the titles of the challenges. Challenge 1 We have a binary to decompile. I use Ghidra and locate a strange function called thisone The printFlag function decodes the flag. I write a program to mimic the decoding:
